description: Detects suspicious parameters of fsutil (deleting USN journal, configuring it with small size, etc). Might be used by ransomwares during the attack (seen by NotPetya and others). Author: Ecco, E.M. Anhaus, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
name: Fsutil Suspicious Invocation
